org.threadly.concurrent.lock

Class NativeLockFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.concurrent.lock.NativeLockFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LockFactory

    public class NativeLockFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements LockFactory

    Implementation of LockFactory which produces native (blocking) locks. See NativeLock.

      • isNativeLockFactory

        public boolean isNativeLockFactory()
        Description copied from interface: LockFactory
        Call to check if the lock factory produces blocking native locks. Or if it defaults to a test implementation.
        Specified by:
        isNativeLockFactory in interface LockFactory
        Returns:
